description:
The ultimate bushido arena battle has landed!
Black and White Bushido is the stealth â€˜em multiplayer fighting game, perfect for couch co-op. 

Fight for control of the light or the dark in multiple arenas, hiding from your foes and seizing objectives. Pick up items and use them to surprise, maim and trap your opponents in a way only a true warrior can.

The unique combat system allows you to cut through the air and clash with your foes.

- 1-4 Local Multiplayer
- Seven exciting and dynamically changing arenas
- 2 compelling modes of combat - Team Deathmatch & Capture The Flag
- Set high scores and challenge yourself against AI opponents in Practice mode
- Unlockable achievements and levels
name: Black and White Bushido
